Codamotion RTNet SDK for Java

This software provides full real-time access to Codamotion 3D measurement systems and supported peripheral devices.

See:
          Description

Packages
com.codamotion.rtnet The core package in the Codamotion RTNet SDK for Java, providing full real-time access to Codamotion 3D measurement systems and supported peripheral devices.

 

This software provides full real-time access to Codamotion 3D measurement systems and supported peripheral devices. Welcome to the Codamotion RTNet SDK for Java.

Getting Started

These help files assume that you are familiar with the main features of Codamotion measurement systems and with Java software development.

The key class for communication with a Codamotion RTNet server is RTNetClient. To attempt to locate the server's port and IP address automatically you may used the RTNetAutoDiscover class. Once connected to a server, you will use RTNetClient.createDataStream to establish a network stream for real-time data packets.
